install.description: 2006 Porsche 997 Though very simple and straightforward this is a good looking solution for getting XM into any 911.
2003 Land Rover Range Rover If all else fails go in the overhead with the XM controller. If you don’t mind relocating your sunglasses.
2004 Infinity G35 If you don’t have the factory navigation, this pocket makes for a great spot to mount the XM display. The best part is you can still close it and put it out of sight.
2006 Porsche 997 Even if you choose Sirius satellite radio for your 911, with the right controller it can look unobtrusive.
2005 Porsche Cayenne We can make a custom bracket, usually without any permanent modifications to the vehicle. This may not be the best looking option but definitely functional and cost effective.
2002 Toyota RAV4 Talk about easy to use and navigate. This Eclipse AVN lists the categories right on the touch-screen. It will also display the title and artist currently playing.

2003 BMW X5 This non-smoking customer wanted us to mount the XM Commander inside the ashtray along with a bass control knob and an AUX input selector. The antenna was mounted inside the factory spoiler.
